【合併】総合日本学習科目（日本のビジネスA）（CIEC）/Japanese Business A（国際学部）
授業方法: Seminar. Based on weekly readings and class discussions, students will gain an understanding of characteristics and phenomena of the Japanese employment system. At the beginning of each class students will present a summary of the assigned readings followed by class discussions that will be supplemented by materials from the instructor, such as newspaper articles, recent statistics and film clips from documentaries and interviews.
